## Merge
```{r}

#Merge
merged_df = rbind.fill(CF1,CF2,CF3)

merged_df$DOY = yday(merged_df$date)

merged_df$year = substr(merged_df$date,1,4)


```

# Daily Average
```{r}

avg = timeAverage(
  merged_df,
  avg.time = 'day',
  data.thresh = 0,
  statistic = 'mean',
  fill = TRUE
)


df = timeAverage(
  CF3,
  avg.time = 'day',
  data.thresh = 40,
  statistic = 'mean',
  fill = TRUE
)


```
## time separations 
```{r}
avg$year = substr(avg$date,1,4)
avg$year <- factor(avg$year)

avg$DOY = yday(avg$date)
avg$DOY <- as.numeric(avg$DOY)

df$year = substr(df$date,1,4)
df$year <- factor(df$year)

df$DOY = yday(df$date)
df$DOY <- as.numeric(df$DOY)
```

# Raster Column format is |Date|SoilT|SoilDepth|
```{r}

dfnew = df
dfnew$TS_1_0_1 = dfnew$TS_2_0_1

ras <- dfnew[,c('date',
            'TS_2_0_1', 
            'TS_2_1_1', 
            'TS_2_2_1', 
            'TS_2_3_1',
            'TS_2_4_1',
            'TS_2_5_1', 
            'TS_2_6_1', 
            'TS_2_7_1', 
            'TS_2_8_1',
            'TS_2_9_1')]


# Reshape the data into long format
ras <- ras %>%
  pivot_longer(
    cols = -date,  # Exclude TIMESTAMP column
    names_to = "SoilDepth",
    values_to = "SoilTemperature",
    names_pattern = "TS_2_(\\d+)_1"  # Pattern to extract numeric depth information
  ) %>%
  mutate(SoilDepth = as.numeric(gsub("TS_2_", "", SoilDepth)) * 10)  # Convert extracted depth to numeric

# Extract Date from TIMESTAMP column
ras$date <- as.Date(ras$date)

# Select and reorder columns
ras <- ras %>%
  select(date, SoilDepth, SoilTemperature)

library(viridis)

ggplot(ras, aes(x = date, y = SoilDepth, fill = SoilTemperature)) +
  geom_tile(width = 1, height = 10) +  # Adjust width and height as needed
  scale_fill_viridis(option = "turbo") +  # Use the "magma" color palette
  labs(x = "Date", y = "Soil Depth", fill = "Soil Temperature") +
  scale_y_reverse() +  # Invert the y-axis
  theme_minimal()
  
```
